page.title: 10HOUSES AROUND WARE
page.content: On the outskirts of {Ware}there are { {new houses}.Most are {semi_detached,} then,small blocks of flats,then maisonettesand a few detached houses. Many buildings are 25_45 years old,some are less than 25 years old and a few are over a hundred years old.Mr.Baker,once a pupil at St.Mary's School,remembers cow fields all around his old house. The main {materials}used are{red brick stretcher bond,with grey curly tiles on the roof.Some have wood or tiles or pebble dash on part of the walls and large windows with metal frames.The { {old houses}are {yellow brick},Flemish bond,with slate roofs and small windows.Some people have changed their windows for big new ones.Nearly all thehouses are{owned}by the people who live in them.
